long_description: Suited to the fast stops and the uneven pavement of urban streets, the Raleigh Misceo 3.0 bike combines powerful hydraulic disc brakes with 24 versatile gears for any route you choose to take. Butted aluminum frame features a formed down tube and is designed for comfort and efficiency; flat handlebar encourages an upright riding position for great visibility. Shimano crankset and drivetrain provide easy pedaling and shifting through all 24 speeds; bike is geared for hills as well as flats. Promax Decipher hydraulic disc brakes ensure all-weather stopping power so you can stop on a dime, even in the rain. 700c wheels are outfitted with versatile Kenda tires for excellent rolling performance on bike paths and streets alike. Eyelets accept fenders and rear rack (not included). Specs on the Raleigh Misceo 3.0 bike are subject to change.
short_description: Suited to the fast stops and the uneven pavement of urban streets, the Raleigh Misceo 3.0 bike combines powerful hydraulic disc brakes with 24 versatile gears for any route you choose to take.
